recoursemech: Any questions or concerns regarding the use or disclosure of personal information should be directed to the Shareholder InSite, Inc. Corporate Office at the address given below. Shareholder InSite, Inc. will investigate and attempt to resolve complaints and disputes regarding use and disclosure of personal information in accordance with the principles contained in this Safe Harbor Policy. For disputes involving personal information transferred under the US-EU Safe Harbor Principles, Shareholder InSite, Inc. has committed to refer unresolved privacy complaints to an independent alternative dispute resolution provider, the International Centre for Dispute Resolution™/American Arbitration Association® Safe Harbor Program for mediation
